TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ScriptMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether and objects refer to the debug or release version of client scripts.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>列舉來設定要使用在網頁上的用戶端指令碼的版本會提供值。 列舉值可套用至<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性或[ScriptReference.ScriptMode](<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A>)屬性。 <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>物件會設定頁面上的所有指令碼的版本會覆寫它，除非<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>物件。 <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>物件設定特定的指令碼的版本。
<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType>值產生不同的結果，根據它參考到獨立的指令碼檔案或組件中內嵌為資源的指令碼檔案。 獨立的指令碼檔案以定義[ScriptReference.Path](<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>)屬性。 組件參考必須透過<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>屬性。 結果<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType>值如下：
- 套用到獨立的指令碼檔案時，[ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>指定屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType>值相當於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Release?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
- 當它套用到組件中的指令碼參考<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType>相當於<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit?displayProperty=nameWithType>。 只有當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>指定，它用來參考指令碼。 當<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>和 [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>屬性都是這兩個指定，[ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>而不是使用屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>，但<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType>值等於仍<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Inherit?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
如果指令碼之要求的版本不存在，則會擲回錯誤。 比方說，如果名為 CustomScript.js 獨立指令碼檔案建立的參考會擲回錯誤而<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode.Debug?displayProperty=nameWithType>，但 CustomScript.debug.js 站台上不存在。 如果偵錯版本不存在的組件中的指令碼的參考就會傳回發行版本。
> [!NOTE] > 當`retail`屬性[部署](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbcc2c62-3159-4a62-9f1e-8cfe3b8b09dc)Machine.config 檔案的元素設定為`true`，用戶端指令碼的發行版本中使用的網站。 <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>值<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和[ScriptReference.ScriptMode](<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A>)屬性會被忽略。
## Examples 下列範例會顯示頁面之指令碼版本以宣告方式設定為發行版本<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控制項，但一個名為 CustomClient.js 的指令碼以宣告方式設定為在偵錯<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>控制項。
[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptMode/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptMode/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ScriptMode Auto = int32(0)

Docs.summary: In the control, the version of client scripts to use is determined at run time based on the application-level [<compilation>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12) element of the Web.config file, unless it is overridden in an instance of the control. In the control, when applied to a standalone script file, is equivalent to . When applied to a script reference in an assembly, is equivalent to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ScriptMode Debug = int32(2)

Docs.summary: In the control, the debug version of the client script is used on the Web page unless overridden in an instance of the control. In the control, the debug version of the client script is used on the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ScriptMode Inherit = int32(1)

Docs.summary: In the control, is equivalent to . In the control, the value from determines which version of the client script to use.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ScriptMode Release = int32(3)

Docs.summary: In the control, the release version of the client script is used on the Web page unless overridden by setting the property of a instance to . In the control, the release version of the client script is used on the Web page.
